summary: 17 CFR § 240.10b-5 prohibits the use of manipulative and deceptive practices in securities trading, including fraud, false statements, and omissions of material facts. This rule applies to any person using interstate commerce, mail, or national securities exchanges for the purchase or sale of securities. Violations can result in legal penalties.
